events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your store, but it arrived with several scratches and stains. I want to return it and get a full refund as soon as possible.
The reported issue involves a product defect prompting a refund request, therefore categorized under Refund.
Your case has been assigned to one of our customer support agents who will assist you further with your refund request.
Hello! I’m sorry to hear about the condition of your jacket. I’m here to help you with the return and refund process.
Could you please provide the order number and upload some photos showing the scratches and stains on the jacket?
Thank you for responding. The order number is 987654321, and I have attached images clearly showing the damages on the jacket's front and sleeves.
We have reviewed the photos and agree the item arrived damaged. We will initiate a full refund immediately and provide a prepaid shipping label for you to return the jacket.
Thanks for the quick action. I appreciate the prepaid label and refund process being started promptly.
Your refund request has been processed and will appear in your account within 5-7 business days. The return label has been sent to your email.
We are following up to confirm you have received the refund and the return shipment went smoothly. Please let us know if you need further assistance.
Since your refund has been successfully completed and no further issues are reported, we are closing this support case. Thank you for contacting us.
